section.title: Early startup actions
section.para: The Eclipse platform provides the org.eclipse.ui.startup extension point via the org.eclipse.ui plug-in.

note.para: This extension point is not used for Eclipse 4 RCP applications, use a life cycle hook or model add-on to archive similar behavior.

section.para: To implement an extension to this extension point, select Add... on the Extensions tab of the plugin.xml editor and point to a class implementing the IStartup interface.
